definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: This article mainly illustrated the application of soil erosion estimation method based on Geographic Information System (GIS) and remote sensing (RS) technology.
sentences.chinese: 研究了土壤侵蚀定量遥感方法在浙江省仙居县的应用。

sentences.english: This paper has described the application of remote sensing technology in environmental monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 本文将遥感技术在环境监测中的应用状况做了介绍。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper presents ar emote sensing system.
sentences.chinese: 最后，本文实现了一个遥感影像处理系统。

sentences.english: This paper introduces applications of the satellite remote sensing technology in salt industry.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了卫星遥感技术在盐业生产中的应用。

sentences.english: Building seismic characteristics are thoroughly analyzed on remote sensing image.
sentences.chinese: 全面分析了遥感影像上建筑物的震害特征。

sentences.english: The profiling method is the preferred way to measure remote sensing reflectance.
sentences.chinese: 光学剖面法是测量遥感反射率的首选方法。

sentences.english: The use of microwave remote sensing has demonstrated great potential for measurement of soil moisture.
sentences.chinese: 微波遥感是测量土坡水分的一种重要方法。

sentences.english: Military survey forces should provide new and timely remote-sensing information and data.
sentences.chinese: 测绘部队应该提供新的及时的遥感信息和数据。

sentences.english: RS image classification and information derivation of mosquito habitats.
sentences.chinese: 蚊媒孳生环境遥感分类和遥感信息提取研究。

sentences.english: RS image classification and information derivation of mosquito habitats.
sentences.chinese: 蚊媒孳生环境遥感分类和遥感信息提取研究。

sentences.english: Information mechanism of quantum remote sensing is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了量子遥感信息机理。

sentences.english: A new edge detection algorithm of multi-spectrum remote sensing image was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于云的多光谱遥感影像边缘检测算法。

sentences.english: The space remote sensing instrument is an essential component in the applied satellite.
sentences.chinese: 空间遥感仪器是应用卫星的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The method and index of using remote sense image to classify the land use are various.
sentences.chinese: 利用遥感影像进行土地利用分类有多种方法和指标。

sentences.english: Ability to estimate crop information from remotely sensed imagery is fundamental in precision agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 估计农作物遥感影像信息的能力是在精准农业的基础。

sentences.english: The second part is the pre-processing of TM images.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分为遥感影像处理。

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
